patterns: Can you tell me about khec?
Please provide me some information about college
can i get more info about college?
responses: Khwopa is the prehistoric name of Bhaktapur, the abode of art and culture. Bhaktapur municipality is a pioneer to establish higher educational institutes by local governments in Nepal. Khwopa (Higher) Secondary School, established in 1999 A.D (2056 B.S.), was the first academic institute established by  Bhaktapur Municipality. Within two decades, Bhaktapur municipality has succeeded in establishing seven higher educational institutions.
It was established in 2001 BS
It was founded in 2001 BS

patterns: What are the procedure for admission?
responses: Student must fill up entrance form and take the entrance exam conducted by Purbanchal University. If student passes the entrance, he/she will be eligible for interview. After students are approved from interview ,then they can submit their admission fee in account section and submit other required documents in administration section

After entrance exam ,First you are called for interview. Within 2-3 days of interview you should submit admission fee based on availability of seats because the seats are filled by the procedure of First Come First Basis Admission

After entrance exam ,You will be called for an interview first. Within 2-3 days of the interview, you must submit an admission fee based on seat availability, as seats are filled on a first-come, first-served basis

patterns: What are the procedure for giving entrance exam?

responses: In order to start off Admission in Khwopa Engineering College, first of all fill up the Entrance Exam Form and submit it along with the relevant documents & appear in Entrance Examination given by Purbanchal University

patterns: Who can we apply for studying in college?
what are the requirement for applying?
how can i join the bachleor?
What are the academic requirements to qualify for the honors college?
responses: Student should pass B.E./B.Arch. Entrance Examination conducted by PU and must have completed I.Sc. or +2 (Science) or Diploma in Engineering (3 years) or equivalent with minimum 45% or 'C' grade in all subjects with minimum 2.00 GPA
Those who have completed Diploma in Civil or Computer or Architecture or passed +2 level in science can apply only after passing the entrance exam conducted by Purbanchal  University
Those who have obtained a diploma in civil, computer, or architecture, or who have passed the +2 level in science, can apply only after completing the Purbanchal University admission exam

patterns: Are your classes lecture-based or discussion-based?
what are the classes based on?

patterns: do college provide study loan to economically poor students?
Is there loan system or provision?
responses: Sorry to say but there is no such system but we are working on that for betterment for economically poor student and hope we will be on it asap

patterns: what time college or class started?
What time college gate is closed?
what is starting time of college?
tell me about shift of college?
responses: During summer college gate close and class get started at 7:15 am and during winter college gate close and class get started at 8:15 am and get over at 1:55pm
